name: FeelTheFear
description:
Instructions to play:

Double click on the A_FeelTheFear_Program.

Version 1.1 uploaded 23:15 11 Dec 22 with minor typo corrections.

Maximize the window if you want (it starts in Windowed mode).

Press help in the adventure to see a list of commands.

Monitor your tiredness, hunger and thirst status during the game.
